translation.zh: 我知道公司在纽约高价聘请了律师

向海关和边境保护局注册

translation.zh: 以备边境执法人员查验

translation.zh: 重返职场让我感到极其难受

translation.en: It was like being in prison.
translation.zh: 感觉就像坐牢

translation.zh: 只是当时没钱 我必须忍一阵子

translation.zh:
印象中我爸

translation.zh:
其中一个买家得知
我手上有泡泡男糖果盒

translation.zh: 通过口耳相传 买家纷纷出现

translation.zh: 通过电话 一传十 十传百

translation.zh:
说真的 我对买家开的价
感到十分震惊

translation.zh: 有人说：“我要跟你买下那个泡泡男

translation.zh: 出价1250美元”

translation.zh: 我听了说：“什么？”

translation.zh:
那是马科斯送的礼物
我们起初没打算卖掉

translation.en: Here I am, a college student paying for my own tuition and everything...
translation.zh:
当时我还是一个大学生
学费、生活费都要自掏腰包

translation.en: being offered 1,250 bucks for a piece of plastic that was given to me for free.
translation.zh:
有人出价1250美元
要买我手上的一个免费塑料玩具

translation.en: [Steve] The last thing in the world I wanted to do was sell Bubble Boy.
translation.zh: 我很不愿意卖掉泡泡男

translation.en: But, hey, man, I gotta pay some bills. [laughing]
translation.zh: 可是我还得缴付账单

translation.en: Money talks. Money talks.
translation.zh: 有钱能使鬼推磨

translation.en: [Steve] The collectors bought pretty much everything I had, overnight.
translation.zh:
几乎在一夜间
收藏家买光了我手上的商品

translation.zh: 每个糖果盒我用27分钱买下

translation.en: 300 bucks.
translation.zh: 以300美元转卖

translation.en: Without those early sales, I never would have been able to quit my job.
translation.zh:
要不是初期卖出这批货
我不可能辞职不干

translation.zh:
我对工厂最后某段记忆
是收音机播放着恩雅的歌

translation.en: And it was just floating. Through the whole shop. Her voice. And echoing.
translation.zh:
听起来飘飘然的
她的歌声在整个空间回荡

translation.en: [Steve] Her music was, like, a place I wanted to be.
translation.zh: 她的音乐犹如我向往的某个地方

translation.en: And traveling to Europe, and my dreams, married perfectly well with that.
translation.zh:
前往欧洲追求梦想
完全符合这首歌的意境

translation.en: [Steve] When I left the shop for the last time, I went from,
translation.zh:
最后一次离开工厂后 我从每周工作79个小时
转行去做自己爱做的事

translation.en: uh, working 79-hour work weeks to doing my own thing.
translation.zh:
我从每周工作79个小时
转行去做自己爱做的事

translation.en: I went to selling toys and Pez full-time.
translation.zh: 全职卖玩具和贝思糖果盒

translation.en: [David] At that time, the hobby was kind of this small,
translation.zh:
那个年代 这个爱好的圈子很小
是个关系密切的团体

translation.zh:
那个年代 这个爱好的圈子很小
是个关系密切的团体 我们都互相认识的

translation.en: And Steve was like this, you know...
translation.zh: 史蒂芬就像个神秘的山怪

translation.en: magical troll who just sprung forth out of nowhere.
translation.zh: 突然从某处冒出来

translation.zh: 他发现了收藏贝思糖果盒的群体

translation.zh: 并开始跟我们交谈

translation.zh:
贝思群体很小
我所知道的一切都是他们教的

translation.zh:
欢迎来到
贝思糖果盒收藏家的美好世界

translation.en: You're hooked now.
translation.zh: 你走不了了

translation.zh: 我喜欢喝苏格兰威士忌 也喜欢跑车

translation.en: But there-- there's nothing that compares with the feeling
translation.zh:
但没什么比找到
一个牛逼的贝斯糖果盒

translation.en: you get when you get a great find in Pez.
translation.zh: 更令人感到满足

translation.en: So, this is my Pez room.
translation.zh: 这是我收藏贝思糖果盒的房间

translation.en: So, I've been collecting about 20 years.
translation.zh: 我收藏贝思糖果盒约20年了

translation.zh:
雷神介于200到300美元之间
这个小马市价可达1300美元

translation.en: [Tina] I have 53 covered grandstands.
translation.zh: 我有53个盒盖展示架

translation.zh: 每个容纳80个糖果盒

translation.en: [Johann] I have everything filled up. Every empty space is filled up with junk.
translation.zh:
所有展示架都给我填满了
每个空间都一大堆收藏品填满

translation.en: So, if you want to give me a title, you can say to me I am a crazy collector.
translation.zh:
真要给我一个外号
叫我“疯狂收藏家”并不为过

translation.zh: 我曾花2500美元买一个糖果盒

translation.zh:
最高价记录
我曾付一万一千美元买一个

translation.en: -[interviewer] For one? -One.
translation.zh:
-就一个？
-就一个

translation.en: [John] And so, in the Pez world,
translation.zh: 在贝思的圈子中

translation.en: the person who brought the most new product to us was Steve Glew.
translation.zh:
史蒂夫·格莱是
那个为我们带入最多新产品的人

translation.en: [Steve] With the prices people were paying,
translation.zh: 看到人们付出的价码

translation.en: Josh and me were itching to go back and get more product.
translation.zh: 我和乔什很想再回去领取更多产品

translation.en: And I had heard the real mother lode... was Hungary.
translation.zh: 后来我听说真正的主产区在匈牙利

translation.en: And Gunther was a person of importance there.
translation.zh: 而冈瑟是当地工厂的大人物
（匈牙利 杰尔市）

translation.en: [Steve] He had been a person within the upper echelon at Pez corporation in Austria, in Linz.
translation.zh:
他一直是
奥地利林茨市贝思公司的高层

translation.en: And he had been tasked with the role of opening up the East.
translation.zh: 他受命到东部开发市场

translation.en: He had power. He had power.
translation.zh: 有权有势

translation.en: First time I met him, I believe it was on our second trip to Europe.
translation.zh:
第一次见到他
应该是在我们的第二趟欧洲之行

translation.en: I mean, like, I walk in the door and I ask about Pez,
translation.zh: 我一踏进门就问有没有贝思糖果盒

translation.en: and Gunther Leitner came out in the most God-awful
translation.zh: 冈瑟·莱纳穿着一件

translation.en: plaid sports jacket I have ever seen in my life.
translation.zh:
我毕生见过
最难看的格纹休闲外套走出来

translation.en: He comes up to me at the counter and he said,
translation.zh: 他走到柜台前问我

translation.en: "I hear you're here huntin' for Pez, eh?"
translation.zh: “听说你来找贝思糖果盒 对吗？”

translation.en: And I goes, "Yeah, I'm huntin' for it." He says, "Yeah, I know, I know, I know."
translation.zh:
我说：“是啊 我来找贝思糖果盒”
他说：“我懂…”

translation.en: And he says, "Don't you-- don't you know who I am?"
translation.zh: 他接着问：“你不知道我是谁吗？”

translation.en: [Steve] No, I have no idea who you are and I don't really give a damn.
translation.zh:
我回应：“我不知道你是谁
也不怎么在乎你是谁”

translation.en: Gunther took a Post-it, just a stupid little Post-it.
translation.zh: 冈瑟撕下一小张不起眼的便条纸

translation.zh:
写了几个字 并在上面签名
他说：“拿去 走到那边”

translation.en: And I handed the post-it to the, uh, the guard at the gate.
translation.zh: 我把便条纸交给大门的保全

translation.en: I mean, he might as well have hopped to and clicked
translation.zh: 他鞋跟咔哒一声跳起来

translation.en: his heels and opened up the gate.
translation.zh: 他鞋跟咔哒一声跳起来 马上打开大门

translation.en: I mean, really. That little Post-it.
translation.zh: 是那张小便条纸的权威

translation.en: Everybody did anything we ask.
translation.zh: 他们对我们有求必应

translation.en: People walked up to me, and every time I showed it to 'em,
translation.zh:
每次有人走前来
只要我出示那张便条纸

translation.en: "Yep, yep. Yep, yep. Over here. Over here."
translation.zh: 他们就会说：“没错 在这边”

translation.en: Next thing I know, they got a truck... for me to load.
translation.zh:
下一秒
我发现他们为我准备了一辆载货卡车

translation.en: And take everything off to the airport.
translation.zh: 然后把货都送到机场

translation.en: And he truly was that powerful.
translation.zh: 他就是那么位高权重

translation.en: Just wished I could have taken it all. I really wish I could've, but I couldn't.
translation.zh:
真希望我能带走所有糖果盒
可惜我做不到

translation.en: I only had 4,000 bucks maybe in my pocket, so, I mean,
translation.zh: 我口袋里只有四千美元

translation.en: it was very disappointing for Gunther, you know?
translation.zh: 冈瑟知道后非常失望

translation.zh: 他没把钱交给贝思公司

translation.en: He kept it.
translation.zh: 而是自己留着

translation.zh: 我记得他下车后说的最后一句话

translation.en: He leans back in and he goes, "I don't know you. I don't know you."
translation.zh: 他向前倾斜说：“我不认识你”

translation.en: [laughing] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.zh:
这时我们发现市面上
到处流窜着违禁的贝思糖果盒

translation.en: Word came out that somebody took some pre-production samples and were selling those.
translation.zh:
谣传有人拿了
一些产前样放在市面上卖

translation.en: Pre-production samples, illegal, on the black market.
translation.zh: 黑市上的产前样都是违禁品

translation.zh: 显然有人去到欧洲

translation.zh: 跟当地厂工会面

translation.zh: 付他们几百美元

translation.zh: 这些产前样就迅速消失了

translation.zh: 我的反应是 工厂没有守卫吗？

translation.zh: 他不是去度假带几个回来

translation.zh: 这家伙带了数以千计的糖果回国

translation.zh: 斯科特知道这事后

translation.en: So, his mission was to find out who was doing this.
translation.zh: 就决定找出这个始作俑者

translation.zh: 我任职警员20年

translation.zh:
并在1995年开始出版
《贝思糖果盒收藏家期刊》

translation.zh: 身为收藏家 出版期刊的目的是

translation.zh: 将消息传达给其他收藏家

translation.en: what's out there, and what's real,
translation.zh:
告知他们市场上有哪些产品
哪些是正品

translation.en: and is-- is there any fakes going around.
translation.zh: 市面上有没有仿冒品

translation.zh:
从多方面看来
里奇是美国贝思公司的头号间谍

translation.en: No, I wasn't a spy.
translation.zh: 不是 我不是间谍

translation.zh:
人们以为我在监视
贝思糖果盒的买卖活动 实则不然

实则不然
我真的没向厂商透露过什么

translation.zh: 当然是 在我看来毋庸置疑

translation.zh: 人人都知道斯科特·迈克威尼常说

translation.zh: 人人都知道斯科特·迈克威尼常说 贝思公司不欢迎收藏家

translation.zh: 他不是一个讨喜的人物

translation.zh:
有点自以为是、狂妄自大
也有点缺乏安全感

translation.zh:
我听很多人说过 斯科特·迈克威尼

斯科特·迈克威尼

translation.zh: 我们所说的一切都会传到他耳中

translation.zh: 斯科特很清楚收藏家的市场越来越大

translation.zh: 也很清楚收藏家市场中的违法活动

translation.zh:
于是我们邀请

translation.zh: 设法通过他传递信息给收藏家群体

translation.zh:
他来参观工厂 也采访了斯科特一两个小时
之后还一起共进午餐

translation.zh:
也采访了斯科特一两个小时
之后还一起共进午餐

translation.zh: 那个体验很有意思

那是我第一次参观贝思工厂

translation.zh: 里奇有没有按照你们的指示去做？

translation.zh: 有啊 他都做了

translation.zh: 他就像我们公司的公关

translation.zh:
那个要价约700美元
背后还有一张贴纸

translation.en: An original sticker.
translation.zh: 这是原版贴纸

translation.en: [man] Wow, that's terrific.
translation.zh: 天啊 好厉害

translation.zh:
谢谢你 里奇 感激不尽
如今我们知道为何人人都爱贝思了

translation.en: [Richie] I remember when I went to the Pez factory,
translation.zh: 记得我去参观贝思工厂时

translation.en: Scott McWhinnie pulled one out of his pocket.
translation.zh:
斯科特·迈克威尼
从口袋里取出一个糖果盒问

translation.en: He goes, "Hey, you see this dispenser?
translation.zh:
“看到这个糖果盒吗？
知道这是什么吗？”

translation.zh:
“看到这个糖果盒吗？
知道这是什么吗？” 我说：“知道啊”
他接着说：“我要马上推出市场”

translation.en: And he says, "Yeah, I'm gonna be sellin' it soon."
translation.zh:
我说：“知道啊”
他接着说：“我要马上推出市场”

translation.en: Bubble Man was designed by Scott McWhinnie.
translation.zh:
“泡泡男”是
斯科特·迈克威尼设计的作品

translation.en: He loved it. Absolutely, [coughing] he was passionate about it.
translation.zh: 他非常喜欢 他对泡泡男充满热忱

translation.en: That was his.
translation.zh: 那是他的作品

translation.zh: 人物特征都是出自他的手笔和设计

translation.zh: 他甚至连人物名称都注册好了

translation.zh: 可说是斯科特亲手完成的项目

translation.en: And I-- I think he-- he cared very much about it.
translation.zh: 我相信他很在乎这个项目

translation.en: However, that project was put on hold.
translation.zh: 但是 那个项目被搁置了

translation.zh: 当斯科特听到 有人将泡泡男带入美国境内

translation.en: Bubble Man over into the United States
translation.zh: 有人将泡泡男带入美国境内

translation.en: and selling them for an obscene amount of money,
translation.zh: 且以高价出售

translation.en: that burned him up.
translation.zh: 他气得暴跳如雷

translation.en: Most expensive one here right now is this guy here.
translation.zh: 最贵的商品是这个家伙

translation.zh: 它不老 它生于1992年 它叫“泡泡男”

translation.en: He's a prototype.
translation.zh: 它是个商品原型

translation.zh:
斯科特·迈克威尼
在观赏贝思展销会的新闻片段时

translation.zh:
斯科特·迈克威尼
在观赏贝思展销会的新闻片段时 发现了泡泡男的存在

translation.en: Some girl had one for sale.
translation.zh: 有个女生摆卖着一个

translation.en: [woman] There's only about 20 known in the whole world.
translation.zh: 全世界只有20个

translation.en: It was something they designed that they didn't have to pay licensing for.
translation.zh: 这是公司设计未经授权出售的东西

translation.en: Manufactured a few, and looked at it and said,
translation.zh: 贝思公司生产了几个后 望着它说

translation.en: "what were we thinking when we made this?"

translation.zh: 是因为这件疯狂的事养活了我的家人

translation.en: But if I was gonna continue with Pez, I realized that I had to take action.
translation.zh:
但如果我还想继续买卖糖果盒
我就要采取应对措施

translation.en: We gotta find other ways to do things.
translation.zh: 我们必须找出其他做生意的方法

translation.en: And that is what led to... the big decision.
translation.zh: 于是我们做了一个重大的决定

translation.en: The ball had started to roll and I don't know if I could have stopped it.
translation.zh: 雪球越滚越大 我都不知道我有没有能力去阻止

translation.en: [Steve] Trying to find... There we go.
translation.zh: 我要找… 找到了

translation.en: After buying all this product for so long,
translation.zh: 购买这家公司的产品这么多年

translation.en: i-- it finally occurred to me, why don't I create my own?
translation.zh:
后来某天 我灵机一动
何不自己设计呢？

translation.en: Um, I had a lot of good ideas, just like Marcos.
translation.zh: 我有很多好创意 就像马科斯

translation.en: He's gonna hate me for this.
translation.zh: 他一定会恨死我的

translation.en: Steve was very creative.
translation.zh: 史蒂夫很有创意

translation.en: He kept coming up with all these different interesting color variations like, um,
translation.zh: 他不断推出不同色调的产品

translation.en: crystal Pez with see-through heads.
translation.zh:
例如水晶糖果盒
上面有透明的玩偶头

translation.en: [David] If the order was, you know, large quantities,
translation.zh: 如果是大订单

translation.en: anyone can get anything directly from a factory.
translation.zh: 任何人都可以向厂家直接购买

translation.en: I decided to create my own designs.
translation.zh: 我决定打造自家的设计

translation.en: I'd named 'em the "Holiday Colors."
translation.zh: 并取名为“度假色系”

translation.en: The half million-dollar order was my attempt to come out
translation.zh: 这个五十万美元的订单是我重出江湖

translation.en: of the shadows, and do business openly.
translation.zh: 这个五十万美元的订单是我重出江湖 开始从事正经生意的策略

translation.en: I was trying to go legit. Yes, definitely I was trying to go legit.
translation.zh: 我想将生意合法化 没错 就这么回事

translation.en: And not have to talk in code.
translation.zh: 以后再也不用暗语谈生意了

translation.en: And, uh, be able to say, "Yes, this is my product."
translation.zh:
而是可以大声说：
“没错 这就是我的产品”

translation.en: -[buttons beeping] -[dial tone]
translation.zh: （发送）

translation.en: I mortgaged my house.
translation.zh: 我把房子抵押了

translation.en: I took out a line of credit. -That got me 250 of it. -[cash register dings]
translation.zh:
我去办了一笔贷款
银行借了我二十万美元

translation.en: And then, believe it or not, I had 250 cash.
translation.zh:
信不信由你们
我当时手上有二十五万现金

translation.en: You know, we went from bringing it back in, uh, duffle bags,
translation.zh: 我们从用行李袋装糖果盒

translation.en: to importing it through a broker in Grand Rapids.
translation.zh:
到向位于大急流城的中介公司
进口糖果盒

translation.en: And we were spending huge amounts of money.
translation.zh: 我们开始大手笔地投入资金

translation.en: They created all my product...
translation.zh: 他们负责制造我所有的产品

translation.en: in the name that it was going to, like, Taiwan.
translation.zh: 表面上产品是出口到台湾

translation.en: And Taiwan packaging. [whistling] Rerouted it to me.
translation.zh: 产品在台湾包装后再绕回我手上

translation.en: Legally. On paper, legally.
translation.zh: 表面上 是合法的

translation.en: [Kathy] It did feel like we were putting all of our eggs in one basket
translation.zh: 确实就像是孤注一掷

translation.en: but the basket had held pretty well up until then.
translation.zh:
这盘赌局一直稳胜不败
直到那件事发生为止

translation.en: So I just kinda went along with it.
translation.zh: 我只好听天由命了

translation.en: I laid out the whole business plan, and...
translation.zh: 我拟出整个企业蓝图

translation.en: I could afford to pay just under five bucks per to have them made.
translation.zh:
我只需花5美元成本
制造出一个糖果盒

translation.en: And then sell 'em for 25 and be on a good profit margin.
translation.zh:
然后以25美元售出
从差价中赚取高利润

translation.en: And I'd been assured that this was going to be exclusive to me.
translation.zh: 厂家保证唯独我有这个专利

translation.en: And I have faxes of those assurances.
translation.zh: 这些保证书的传真都在我手上

translation.en: We were set.
translation.zh: 一切准备就绪

translation.en: Half a million dollars was gonna turn into...
translation.zh: 五十万美元将转变成…

translation.en: a minimum of 2.5 million dollars.
translation.zh: 起码两百五十万美元

translation.en: And then Christmas time rolls around, and I was just so excited.
translation.zh: 圣诞季来临之际 我充满了期待

translation.en: Oh, my God. Are you kiddin' me?
translation.zh: 天啊 开什么玩笑？

translation.en: Everything I wanted was in front of me.
translation.zh: 我想要的一切都在眼前

translation.en: [Kathy] Boxes of Pez from floor to ceiling throughout this whole house.
translation.zh:
满屋从下到上
都是装着贝思糖果盒的箱子

translation.en: This is the stuff people dream of.
translation.zh: 这是人们梦寐以求的东西

translation.en: The best thing in the world. And Scott McWhinnie, I'm not done yet.
translation.zh:
没什么比这种事更美好了
我跟斯科特·迈克威尼还没完呢

translation.en: We started selling it at conventions, I started selling it at toy shows.
translation.zh: 我们开始在展销会和玩具展上售卖

translation.en: [Tina] Everybody wanted his colors.
translation.zh: 他推出的色系每个人都想弄到手

translation.en: You know, he had five different stems of a yellow snowman and of the red snowman.
translation.zh:
他推出了五种不同色系的
“黄雪人”和“红雪人”

translation.en: You could only buy them from Steve.
translation.zh: 只能跟史蒂夫买到

translation.en: It was so different than what Pez was putting out.
translation.zh: 他的产品跟贝思公司推出的完全不同

translation.en: So, this is Pez's version of the skull. Right? So, this is his variation.
translation.zh:
这是贝思公司推出的骷髅头
这是他设计的色系

translation.en: You know, he did the black face with the yellow eyes.
translation.zh: 他设计出黑色的骷髅头和黄色的眼睛

translation.en: It just popped. It looked cool.
translation.zh: 非常显眼 看起来很牛逼

translation.en: Steve Glew had so many color variations of things,
translation.zh: 史蒂夫推出的色系繁多

translation.en: that I was in shock when I saw those all out at one table.
translation.zh:
我在其中一个摊位看到全套时
感到很惊讶

translation.en: [Steve] They were selling like a madman. And it was more than I could dream of.
translation.zh:
糖果盒热销大卖
这是连做梦都想不到的成就

translation.en: To have my own product line that I was proud of.
translation.zh: 拥有自己引以为荣的产品线

translation.en: And I was, I was extremely proud of it.
translation.zh: 真的 我为这事感到非常骄傲

translation.en: That was the year that I did a million bucks.
translation.zh: 我也是在那一年赚进了一百万美元

translation.en: It was magic.
translation.zh: 太神奇了

translation.en: Going legit had worked,
translation.zh: 将生意合法化是对的决定

translation.en: but it was the briefest moment ever because,
translation.zh: 但快乐的时间太短暂了 因为…天啊 出大事了

translation.en: oh, man, did the shit hit the fan.
translation.zh:
因为…天啊 出大事了 （贝思展销会
贝思玩偶头 一起狂欢吧）

translation.en: [Tina] Steve and David Welch and I were walking from our rooms upstairs
translation.zh:
当时我和史蒂夫、大卫·韦尔奇
正从楼上的房间

translation.en: down to the convention floor.
translation.zh: 往底楼的展销会会场走去

translation.en: And we walked through the door,
translation.zh: 穿过大门那一刻

translation.en: and the first thing we see is this huge display.
translation.zh: 马上映入眼帘的是一个大大的展示板

translation.en: [Bud] I had a job to do, and I executed the job.
translation.zh:
我受命执行一项任务
也成功完成了任务

translation.en: And the job was to help stop this.
translation.zh: 那项任务就是去遏制整个风气 （贝思美国公司 异类糖果盒）

translation.en: We took every single one of his and copied them.
translation.zh: 我们就他所有作品进行复制

translation.en: Right down to the gnat's eyelash.
translation.zh: 小细节照抄不误

translation.en: This is what Pez did with the Misfit. This is how they packaged it.
translation.zh:
这是贝思公司推出的“异类”
这是他们的包装

translation.en: To them, it was misfit, it was ugly.
translation.zh:
在他们看来
这是“异类” 是难看的东西

translation.en: The ones that Steve had done were on Pez cards.
translation.zh:
史蒂夫的作品
出现在贝思公司的型录上

translation.en: They were made at the factory.
translation.zh: 都是工厂制造的

translation.en: They were on the-- a stripe candy card.
translation.zh: 史蒂夫的包装卡是条纹状的

translation.en: But then when we walked into the ballroom that day,
translation.zh: 但是那天走进会场时

translation.en: they were on a completely different card,
translation.zh: 发现包装卡完全不一样

translation.en: and they were actually labeled on that card as Misfits.
translation.zh: 包装卡上还标记为“异类”

translation.en: Scott came up with the name Misfits
translation.zh: “异类”这个名字是斯科特取的

translation.en: 'cause they didn't fit into the rest of the assortment.
translation.zh:
因为这些产品
不符合公司其他产品的样式

translation.en: The Misfits were manufactured as a way to put him out of business.
translation.zh: 生产“异类”是为了终止他的生财之道

translation.en: Where he was selling them for, say, 20, 25 dollars,
translation.zh: 他的售价是20、25美元

translation.en: we're selling them now for $1.99.
translation.zh: 我们的售价则是1.99美元

translation.en: [Steve] He sold for less than I paid to have it made.
translation.zh: 他的售价比我的成本还低

translation.en: So, basically... pulled the gas right out of him.
translation.zh: 基本上断了他的财路

translation.en: Scott used the marketplace. He used the market to-- to kill him.
translation.zh: 斯科特利用市场来击败了他

translation.en: [Tina] The Pez company decided to put him out of business.
translation.zh: 贝思公司决定阻断他的财路

translation.en: Steve and David turned around and they went back to their room,
translation.zh: 史蒂夫和大卫调转回头

translation.en: and they never came back that day.
translation.zh: 那天以后 他们再也没出现

translation.en: It was horrible.
translation.zh: 很可恶

translation.en: It was just horrible. They hurt him.
translation.zh: 很可恶 他们伤害了他

translation.en: They hurt him financially, really bad.
translation.zh: 也重挫了他的财力

translation.en: [interviewer] Was there part of that you felt like he enjoyed?
translation.zh: 他乐在其中吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: A little-- a little satisfaction.
translation.zh: 有点满足感吧

translation.en: The man was broken that day.
translation.zh: 那天以后 他再也站不起来

translation.en: [Steve] I dropped my prices,
translation.zh: 我被迫降价

translation.en: pushed it out into the market as cheap as I had to.
translation.zh: 以贱价推出市场

translation.en: It didn't work.
translation.zh: 行不通

translation.en: Worthless.
translation.zh: 产品一文不值

translation.en: [Mike] I didn't realize how devastating it was to him, though, initially.
translation.zh: 起初我并不知道他受到的打击有多大

translation.en: This was right around the time my wife
translation.zh: 当时我和太太正在筹备婚礼

translation.en: and I got married, and Steve was supposed to drive up
translation.zh:
当时我和太太正在筹备婚礼 史蒂夫原本打算
从密歇根州开车来出席我们的婚礼

translation.en: from Michigan for our-- for our wedding.
translation.zh:
史蒂夫原本打算
从密歇根州开车来出席我们的婚礼

translation.en: And, uh, he just was a no-show, and I didn't know why.
translation.zh: 但他没出现 我不知道什么原因

translation.en: We lost contact after that, and Steve stopped calling.
translation.zh:
后来我们就失去了联系
史蒂夫再也没打来找我

translation.en: I think he-- I think he stopped taking phone calls, too, because of what-- of what happened to him.
translation.zh:
由于受到了很大的打击
他好像也不接电话了

translation.en: That's when he went into his-- his period of seclusion.
translation.zh: 他也是从那个时候开始了隐居生活

translation.en: Where he just, like, dropped off of the, uh, off of the map.
translation.zh: 与世隔绝

translation.en: [Kathy] He was just dealing with his own demons and...
translation.zh: 他只是在与自己的心魔作战

translation.en: I think that he had to work through that for a long long time.
translation.zh: 我认为他需要很长时间才走出来

translation.en: [Bud] You know, he just sort of went off the radar.
translation.zh: 他就跟消失了一样

translation.en: Which is exactly what the plan was.
translation.zh: 这也是公司的目的

translation.en: [Steve] I lost all my money and went $250,000 in debt.
translation.zh:
我失去了所有的钱
负债二十五万美元

translation.en: You know, you fight for-- to pay your bills.
translation.zh: 我们总得努力偿还账单

translation.en: You damn near lose your house so many times it's tiresome.
translation.zh: 有好几次差点失去家园 好累

translation.en: Josh had to slowly let go of all four of the employees, including my son-in-law.
translation.zh:
乔什必须逐步解雇所有四名员工
包括我女婿在内

translation.en: And his last job... was he fired himself.
translation.zh: 他最后一个职务是开除自己

translation.en: [Kathy] It was kind of a rude awakening.
translation.zh: 那一刻 如梦初醒

translation.en: I think it took a long time for it to really sink in... for me.
translation.zh: 我花了很长时间才看清

translation.en: [Steve] Yeah, I went through some pretty bad years.
translation.zh: 没错 我浑浑噩噩地过了好几年

translation.en: Financially and mentally.
translation.zh: 财力受挫 精神受创

translation.en: But I think that... the crash was important to find me.
translation.zh: 但我认为这场失败让我找到了本心

translation.en: I had a decade of what I call a primal scream.
translation.zh: 我有整整十年活在躁郁的情绪中 （好样的）

translation.en: Scott McWhinnie decided... that he finally had the way to kill me.
translation.zh:
斯科特·迈克威尼认为
他终于找到干掉我的方法

translation.en: And he was right. He did.
translation.zh: 他是对的 他确实把我干掉了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: After the crash, the story was all I had left.
translation.zh: 劫后余生 我只剩下故事

translation.en: And that's when I wrote my blog, Pez Outlaw Diary.
translation.zh:
于是我开始写博文
博客名叫《糖果盒走私大王日记》

translation.en: You don't just create a product. You create a story.
translation.zh:
产品不能说推出就推出
要为它创作一个故事

translation.en: When Steve started writing his blogs... nobody knew any of that about him.
translation.zh: 史蒂夫开始写博文时 没人认识他

translation.en: [Mike] Steve feels that this is his legacy now.
translation.zh: 如今史蒂夫认为这个故事是他的遗产

translation.en: He wants people to know what happened. He wants the story to be out.
translation.zh:
他要人们知道整个来龙去脉
他要公开这个故事

translation.en: It validates it. It says, "Yes, this happened."
translation.zh:
证明这个故事是真的
说明这种事发生过

translation.en: [Steve] I think everyone wants to be remembered in life.
translation.zh: 我认为每个人都不希望自己被遗忘

translation.en: They wanna make their mark.
translation.zh: 他们想在世界上留下印记

translation.en: And they wanna get it right.
translation.zh: 他们想走回正轨

translation.en: At least once.
translation.zh: 起码一次吧

translation.en: Honest to God, if it wasn't for Pez Outlaw,
translation.zh: 说真的 如果不是糖果盒走私大王

translation.en: nobody would remember Scott McWhinnie.
translation.zh: 没人会记得斯科特·迈克威尼

translation.en: He's a plot point in my story.
translation.zh: 他是我故事的重心

translation.en: If I can get this character of Pez Outlaw...
translation.zh:
如果我可以将
“糖果盒走私大王”这个人物

translation.en: deeply ingrained enough into the history of Pez, then...
translation.zh: 深深烙印在贝思公司的史册中

translation.en: that will be enough.
translation.zh: 这就足够了

translation.en: It's a good story. It's a good story.
translation.zh: 这是个精彩的故事

translation.en: [Tina] It was 20 years before I saw Steve again.
translation.zh: 再次见到史蒂夫已经是20年后了

translation.en: And he swore he'd never go to another convention.
translation.zh: 他曾经发誓不会再出席展销会

translation.en: I said, "Steve, everybody wants to know about you, Steve.
translation.zh: 我说：“史蒂夫 大家都想认识你

translation.en: Everybody wants to hear your story."
translation.zh: 大家都想听你的故事”

translation.en: [Richie] Nowadays, I think that, you know, with all the new collectors coming into the hobby,
translation.zh: 这年头越来越多收藏家加入这个爱好

translation.en: they-- they don't know of the backstory.
translation.zh: 他们都不知道这些糖果盒的来历

translation.en: They don't know-- they weren't there when it happened, and...
translation.zh: 不知道发生在哪个时间点

translation.en: [Jim] For a guy like me who wants to collect
translation.zh: 像我这种想要收藏所有贝思商品的人

translation.en: everything Pez, his history was--
translation.zh: 像我这种想要收藏所有贝思商品的人 他的历程是我收藏之路一大部分

translation.en: was part of the influence of-- of even why I collected.
translation.zh: 他的历程是我收藏之路一大部分

translation.en: [John] Steve Glew was a featured person at the convention,
translation.zh: 史蒂夫·格莱是展销会中的大人物

translation.en: and he hadn't been heard from for years.
translation.zh: 多年来都没有他的消息

translation.en: And I mean, there was many, many, many people that wanted his signature.
translation.zh: 很多人都很想得到他的签名

translation.en: He definitely has a great cult following.
translation.zh: 他有一众铁杆粉丝

translation.en: [Jim] He-- he was just this... I don't know, Pez God.
translation.zh: 他被视为“贝思大神”

translation.en: [laughing] I mean, how-- how else do you say it?
translation.zh: 不然要怎么称呼他呢？

translation.en: [Steve] The myth of the whole thing is part of the joy of it, you know?
translation.zh:
故事的精彩之处
在于整个经历的神秘氛围

translation.en: [David] I think everyone wants someone just to say,
translation.zh: 我认为大家都希望有人对我们说

translation.en: "I see what happened to you and it-- and it matters."
translation.zh:
“我理解你经历过什么
这些事很重要”

translation.en: It's-- it's a huge thing to find out that you're not alone.
translation.zh: 得知自己并不孤独很重要

translation.en: [Steve] Everybody wants their story told.
translation.zh: 每个人都想把自己故事讲出来

translation.en: Everybody wants to be remembered.
translation.zh: 每个人都想被记住

translation.en: The story of Pez Outlaw is an act out of my mental issues.
translation.zh:
糖果盒走私大王的故事
其实是我精神状态的产物

translation.en: Learning to cope with anxiety, depression...
translation.zh: 学习跟焦虑症、忧郁症

translation.en: and... the voices in your head, so to speak.
translation.zh:
以及脑海中的声音相处
可以这么说吧

translation.en: And in some cases, some of the things that you have are actually tools.
translation.zh: 有时我们的某些经历其实是工具

translation.en: They are not burdens.
translation.zh: 不是包袱

translation.en: Honestly, I think his story is good,
translation.zh:
实话实说
我认为他的故事很精彩 也很有趣

translation.en: and it's fun, but I think the human side
translation.zh:
实话实说
我认为他的故事很精彩 也很有趣 只是我认为糖果盒走私大王
人性化的一面更有价值

translation.en: of Pez Outlaw is way more valuable.
translation.zh:
只是我认为糖果盒走私大王
人性化的一面更有价值

translation.en: I can be who I am and be miserable...
translation.zh: 我大可接纳自己 怨天尤人

translation.en: or I can be who I am... and try and find the good in it.
translation.zh:
也可以接纳自己
试着在乌云背后找到阳光

translation.en: And if you're lucky, like me, you married your therapist.
translation.zh:
如果你跟我一样幸运
你的另一半就是你的治疗师

translation.en: [Kathy] It was worth it. Every bit of it was worth it.
